exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T H : f x = x Unable to unify "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) (tarski_lfp ?M1464) ?M1465" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) x (tarski_gfp f)".
The LHS of H (f x) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T H : f x = x Unable to unify "?M1464 (tarski_gfp ?M1464) = tarski_gfp ?M1464" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) x (tarski_gfp f)".
The LHS of H (f x) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T H : f x = x Unable to unify "tarski_gfp f" with "x".

original: intros T f x H. apply tarski_lfp_least. rewrite H. apply tarski_gfp_fixed. intros y. rewrite H. reflexivity.
